attributes.action:
A true 2nd referendum on Brexit. 
The Brexit you want
Mays, Labour or No deal.
attributes.additional_details:
The peoples vote will not stop the debate, whoever wins. The country voted for Brexit, small as the majority was. It was democracy.

The politicians cant agree, let the people decide (including 17  year olds) on the type of Brexit the country voted for.

There shouldn't be a Remain option, it is undemocratic and many remainers also believe that.
attributes.background:
The peoples vote will never satisfy 1/2 the population, it will continue/escalate the arguing.
It is undemocratic to rerun as we have voted on Brexit. 
Stop the politicians arguing for their own reasons. 

Let the people choose,   3 options 

Mays/EUs, Labour 6 point, or No deal Brexits
